response.overview: As their small Midwestern town prepares for its annual Christmas Eve parade, a sheriff and his deputy discover that a maniac in a Santa suit is murdering those he judges as naughty.
response.title: Silent Night

titles.title: Noche de Paz Noche de Muerte

cast.name: Rick Skene
cast.character: Ronald Jones Jr. / Ronald Jones Sr.
